form.LN:
Besedo
them
uporabljamo kot predmet ali v predložni zvezi.

sense.def:
Izraz
them
uporabljamo za osebe ali stvari, ki so bile pravkar omenjene in katerih identiteto poznamo.

seg.quote: He took off his glasses and put them in his pocket.
I think some of them may attempt to take an overdose.

sense.def:
Izraz
them
lahko uporabimo namesto
him
ali
her
za osebo, katere spola ne poznamo. Nekateri tej rabi nasprotujejo, češ da ni pravilna.

seg.quote: If anyone phones, tell them I'm out.
